content.text:
# 2018 Empire Slovak Open – Singles

Viktória Kužmová
| runner   =  Verónica Cepede Royg
| score    = 6–4, 1–6, 6–1
| type    = singles doubles
| before_name = Empire Slovak Open – Singles
| after_name = Empire Slovak Open – Singles
}}
Markéta Vondroušová was the defending champion, but chose not to participate.
Viktória Kužmová won the title after defeating Verónica Cepede Royg 6–4, 1–6, 6–1 in the final.
Seeds
Johanna Larsson (quarterfinals)
#  Anna Karolína Schmiedlová (first round)
#  Verónica Cepede Royg (final)
#  Kurumi Nara (quarterfinals)
#  Madison Brengle (second round)
#  Stefanie Vögele (second round)
#  Yanina Wickmayer (first round)
#  Ekaterina Alexandrova (semifinals)
}}
